content.question: Which of the following is true of foreign direct investment in China since the 1980s?

choices.label: Foreign direct investment in China has led to substantial political openings.
Foreign direct investment in China has led to severe environmental degradation.
Foreign direct investment in China has effectively undermined Communist Party rule.
Foreign direct investment in China has led to reunification negotiations with Taiwan.

content.answer: Foreign direct investment in China has led to severe environmental degradation.
